File /std/shops/inherit/craft_shop_category_modify.c

This room will handle craft shop like things, where you sell stuff to the store and it will sell it onto other players after taking a margin. This can be used for potions, pottery, swords, anything!

Written by Pinkfish

Started Thu Feb 5 15:39:57 CST 1998

category_function
int category_function(string name,
int state,
string * voted,
int yes,
int no,
int abstain)
This is the function used as a call back from the controller to deal with category based stuff.

Parameters:
name - the name of the category being processed
state - the state the category is currently in
voted - the number of people who voted
yes - the number who voted yes
no - the number who voted no
abstain - the number who abstained
Returns:
0 on error, timeout of the next stage
